documents.document: @Freya_Gowrley Definitely! I am on lockdown until I submit but after that I think a celebratory cake catch up will be needed.!

@Freya_Gowrley I'm all about the sorbet for s ore throat/cough. You can also get throat sprays that numb/sooth and might help suppress coughing a bit? Sending healthy thoughts your way! 🍋

Past-me made a mistake in leaving serious edits of my introduction as one of the very last things to get done on the thesis, but redeemed herself by making brownies yesterday so I would have something to bribe/comfort myself with. #PhDlife #amwriting #sendhelp

@mailley_watt @Jenny_Knotts @jennski_27 @VAWright10 @AliceStrang @robyneerica @jadehalbert @CasciTRitchie @nia_alexandra_c @scotwomencreate @rpzquinton @jeanmcameron @beckmjones @LordProvostGCC @GSALibrary @PGRNScotland @SueJohnGWL This made my morning - thanks Karen! Proud to be in such great company 💪
@lingerie_addict Opi Nail Envy has worked miracles for me - after about a month of use my nails are stronger and growing more quickly than they ever have! Used to split all the time.

My 189 thesis images are now laid out and captioned, which means I get to read some of the abstracts that came in for the @stuffofwar #WTOStc CFP. Loving what I’ve seen so far! 👏

Wigtown really delivered and the shops were as magical as I’d hoped. Very pleased with this haul, especially the additions to my growing Monica Dickens collection. #Wigtown #BookTown 📚 https://t.co/EZLKt6eFEQ
Really thrilled with the response to this - I can’t wait for September 28th! #WTOStc https://t.co/q7xL5YWA4S

Just a few hours left to get your abstracts in and join us for the first ever @stuffofwar Twitter conference! We can't wait to read all the responses to our #CFP. Thanks to all that have applied so far. #WTOStc https://t.co/ADdrVv8fXu
@rosetotheanne So glad you’re home safe Buddy!! 🐾

Last evening of this mini holiday. After a lovely beach walk I’m doing thesis image formatting with this glorious beer for company. In denial about heading back to Edinburgh madness! #PhDlife #Galloway https://t.co/YjksIscoN1

You have until the end of the day to put in an abstract for the @stuffofwar Twitter conference! Papers must answer the Q: what do we learn about war when we look at the 'other stuff'? No fees, no travelling, apply from anywhere in the world! https://t.co/4Yb0uz3sk2 #CFP #WTOStc
